metadata.title: Grace Before Meals
metadata.description: A blessing prayer recited before eating meals
metadata.origin: Traditional Catholic prayer for blessing food
metadata.usage: Recited before meals in family or communal settings

la.text: Benedic, Domine, nos et haec tua dona quae de tua largitate sumus sumpturi. Per Christum Dominum nostrum. Amen.

en.text: Bless us, O Lord, and these Thy gifts, which we are about to receive from Thy bounty, through Christ our Lord. Amen.
en.notes: Common English version used in Catholic households

es.text: Bendícenos, Señor, y estos dones tuyos que vamos a recibir de tu generosidad, por Cristo nuestro Señor. Amén.
es.notes: Spanish Catholic version for blessing meals

fr.text: Bénissez-nous, Seigneur, ainsi que ces dons que nous allons recevoir de votre bonté, par le Christ notre Seigneur. Amen.

de.text: Segne uns, o Herr, und diese deine Gaben, die wir von deiner Güte empfangen sollen. Durch Christus, unsern Herrn. Amen.

it.text: Benedici noi, o Signore, e questi tuoi doni che stiamo per ricevere dalla tua liberalità. Per Cristo nostro Signore. Amen.

pt.text: Abençoai-nos, Senhor, e estes vossos dons que vamos receber da vossa bondade, por Cristo nosso Senhor. Amém.

pl.text: Błogosław nas, Panie, i te Twoje dary, które mamy otrzymać z Twej hojności. Przez Chrystusa, Pana naszego. Amen.
